name: Talismatic
desc: Detailed data from hiring companies/employment data that contains fields such as job titles, hiring locations, skills, job categories, hiring industries, type of employment and jobs (full-time, part-time, internships, contractual), work authorization, salary data and any derived metrics such as average job-closing time, competitive intelligence, hiring competency, etc.
full_sector_coverage: We cover all sectors that have a presence online, but specialize in Retail, Healthcare, BFSI, IT and Pharmaceutical
data_delivery: Raw, Platform Based, Research Reports, Custom Analysis
why_us?: Clean and accurate data that's easily pluggable. Minimal to nil data latency
advantages: High quality data that undergoes stringent quality checks, Zero-to-nil latency, Verified data sources, Data-driven actionable insights also available upon request
use_cases: Predict labour-related Economic Trends, Determine Business Growth for an industry, Determine a company's growth and hiring strategy, Predict a company’s location-specific Business Strategy, Conduct Competitive Analysis for companies, Use data in conjunction with their existing data to derive further metrics
